mapper.select: SELECT IDX , BOARD_NAME , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , DEL_GB , DATE_FORMAT(WRITE_DT, "%Y-%m-%d ") AS 'WRITE_DT' , WRITE_ID FROM BIM_ARTICLE_TB ORDER BY IDX DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM BIM_ARTICLE_TB WHERE BOARD_NAME = #{boardName} AND DEL_GB = 'N'
AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT(#{searchKeyword} ,'%')
ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM BIM_ARTICLE_TB WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' AND BOARD_NAME = #{boardName} <if test="searchType != null"> AND #{searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%'); </if>

SELECT IDX , BOARD_NAME , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , DEL_GB , DATE_FORMAT(WRITE_DT, "%Y-%m-%d ") AS 'WRITE_DT' , WRITE_ID FROM BIM_ARTICLE_TB WHERE BOARD_NAME = #{boardName} AND DEL_GB = 'N' AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT(#{searchKeyword} ,'%') ORDER BY IDX DESC

SELECT article.IDX , article.BOARD_NAME , board.DEL_GB AS 'BOARD_DEL_GB' , article.TITLE , article.CONTENTS , article.HIT_CNT , article.DEL_GB , article.WRITE_DT, article.WRITE_ID FROM BIM_BOARD_TB board, BIM_ARTICLE_TB article WHERE board.id = article.board_name AND article.idx = #{index};

SELECT IDX , BOARD_NAME , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , DEL_GB , DATE_FORMAT(WRITE_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS 'WRITE_DT' , WRITE_ID FROM BIM_ARTICLE_TB WHERE BOARD_NAME = #{id} AND DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY IDX DESC

SELECT IDX , BOARD_NAME , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , DEL_GB , DATE_FORMAT(WRITE_DT, "%Y-%m-%d ") AS 'WRITE_DT' , WRITE_ID FROM BIM_ARTICLE_TB WHERE BOARD_NAME = #{boardName} AND DEL_GB = 'N'
AND ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword} ,'%')
ORDER BY IDX DESC
LIMIT #{startArticleCnt} , #{displayArticleCnt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BIM_ARTICLE_TB ( IDX , BOARD_NAME , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , DEL_GB , WRITE_DT , WRITE_ID ) VALUES ( NULL, #{boardName}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, 'N', NULL, #{writeId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BIM_ARTICLE_TB SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX= #{idx} AND WRITE_ID = #{writeId}
UPDATE BIM_ARTICLE_TB SET HIT_CNT = COALESCE(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX= #{idx}
